level.text: Each witness, other than an officer or employee of the United States or the District of Columbia, shall receive for his or her attendance the fees prescribed by D.C. Code, ยง15-714 for witnesses in civil cases.
All witnesses shall receive the allowances prescribed by D.C. Code, ยง 15-714 for witnesses in civil cases.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 24 DCR 9391, 9408 (May 5, 1978); Final Rulemaking published at 37 DCR 6032, 6041 (September 14, 1990); and Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 9333, 9342 (December 11, 1992); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 53 DCR 108 (January 6, 2006); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 12322 (December 21, 2007).
